name: Star Girl
description:
A film's star girl has come to the city. She incredibly beautiful and charming. She attracts the attention of the media and paparazzi anytime she appears. She always knows how to refresh herself and make her stand out among the forest of many other star girls. Today, her stylist was absent, so she needs your support in preparing fashion dress up for her next important event. Remember that she is a star girl and you have to make her greatest and updated with the latest fashion trends.
"Star Girl Dress up game" - An interesting time killer and addictive game will never stop entertaining you! Unlike other costume up games, this program provides you with a host of features will keep you engaged for hours. Don’t hesitate, download this free game, and enjoy it to become a great makeup artist, a personal stylist or a fashion expert.
Features *** ***
Classic mode:
- Dress your star girl an amazing style up to your taste!
- Choose color and type of makeup!
- Select a fancy hairstyle and hair color different!
- Create a perfect outfit by combining different items of clothes : dress, shirt, shirts, skirts, socks, shoes in different models and colors!
- Add accessories to fulfill her final look!
- When you have completed your final look, choose your favorite background for the picture of your star girl. You also can choose background from your gallery by tapping 2 seconds in the icon Leaf on the screen.
Customize, rotate, zoom in or zoom the model and background!
Take a photo of your masterpiece and do not forget to share it with your friends on Facebook and Twitter, ..
Time mode:
Remember the clothes you’re suggested and dress her up like that in a certain time to achieve the highest score.
